title: Ask help for Android 10 crashing!
content: I updated my pixel 2 to Android 10 today, then found camera cannot take photos. So I tried to update it through Google Play, then turned out Google Play crashed either. I have already attempt to fix this with restarting under the safe mode, still not work. And I live in China, so basically every steps need VPNâ€¦Can anyone offer some help or advice? thx.
